text: Ani jara tumhi tyanna vicarala ki akasatuna panyaca varsava karuna, jaminila ticya mrtyunantara jivanta karanara kona ahe, tevha niscitaca tyance uttara heca asela ki allaha! Tumhi sanga ki samasta stuti- prasansa allahakaritaca ahe, kimbahuna tyancyata adhikansa loka nirbodha aheta. (Akalana akakala rakhata nahi)
